descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
In this VR Swarm Defense action game, you stand atop a lone defense platform, facing relentless waves of monstrous insects. The swarms surges forward wave after wave, determined to tear down the platform beneath your feet. To survive, you must wield your weapons with precision and fight back against the horde.

The battle intensifies across 12 increasingly challenging waves, each deadlier than the last, until you face the ultimate showdown with the terrifying Swarms Boss. Only by defeating this final enemy can you claim true victory.

With its fast-paced rhythm, immersive VR perspective, and escalating tension, this game throws you straight into the chaos of survival against the swarms. Ready your weapons—your fate rests on this final stand!
